title: 221: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 4 (Dale/Clare Breakup + Matt James Video Exposed + New Contestant Drama + Queen Katie)
itunes:title: 221: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 4 (Dale/Clare Breakup + Matt James Video Exposed + New Contestant Drama + Queen Katie)
description:
The Broads are here for a recap of Matt James’ episode 4 - but FIRST they discuss the breakup of Dale and Clare, Matt James and Tyler Cameron exposed in a video body shaming Queen Victoria, and Matt’s ex roommate talking about her experience with him. Then they dive into the episode and chat about Katie being the absolute queen of the season, the 5 new arrivals at Nemacolin, Anna’s rumor regarding Brittany, the women dressing up like squirrels, falling in love with Michelle, boxing (?!), their discomfort this episode and a whole lot more!
